htmlEmbed:
About Mojeek - building the world's alternative search engine8/18/2022

At Mojeek we like to do things differently, that's why we're building a search engine that respects your privacy whilst providing unique and unbiased results.

ArchivedRead

The alternative search engine that puts the people who use it first.

We like to do things differently...

"

That's why we're on a mission to build the world's alternative search engine; a search engine that does what's right, that values and respects your privacy, whilst providing its own unique and unbiased search results.

"

Search is often considered the gateway to the Web, which is why it's critical that choices exist, choices that take a different approach. By putting the people who use Mojeek first and using technology built from the ground-up, we're here to offer that choice.

Proudly providing independent search without tracking for over 15 years

Our history

Search that doesn't follow you around

Our principles

Independent and unbiased search results

Our values

Search technology created from the ground up

Our technology

Hosted at the UK's greenest data centre

Our planet

Read transcript

What is Mojeek?

From a personal project to indexing over five billion pages

2022

Mojeek releases Focus

2022

Mojeek passes 5 billion pages

2022

Mojeek adds Search Choices

2022

Mojeek Community launched

2021

4 billion page milestone reached

2021

15 years of providing independent search with no tracking

2020

Mojeek indexes over 3 billion pages

2019

Mojeek gets a new logo

2019

Added 100 more web servers

2019

Launched the Search Engine Map website

2018

Image Search and Knowledge Box launched

2018

Mojeek passes 2 billion page milestone

2018

Mojeek secures further funding to expand its team

2017

Mojeek demos the world's first emotional web search

2016

Mojeek secures funding to double its current index size

2015

Mojeek becomes the only search engine in the UK and one of just a handful worldwide to index over a billion pages

2015

Mojeek's founder interviewed on BBC World's Global show and Radio 5 Live

2014

Set new personal record of adding over 5 million new pages to our search index in a single day

2013

Received further investment from a group of private investors

2012

Mobile first and responsive design launched

2012

Mojeek News Search launched

2012

Mojeek launches brand new search engine

2011

New index starts being crawled and built from scratch

2011

Moved new servers into a data centre for the first time

2011

Mojeek mentioned in a parliamentary debate

2009

First ever investment agreed, Mojeek is no longer just a personal project

Meet the team

Igor Brai

Developer

Sam Carroll

Marketing Executive

Colin Hayhurst

CEO

Richard Lees

Developer

Joshua Long

Head of Marketing

Marc Smith

Founder / Developer

MojeekBot

Crawler

Support the project by adding Mojeek to your browser.
